column1: # Title: Arctic Sea-Ice Area (SIA) derived from sea-ice concentration for different sources
# Summary: Monthly mean Arctic sea-ice area calculated from monthly or daily mean sea-ice concentration fields.
#          Daily mean sources are averaged monthly. Temporal gaps <7 days and spatial gaps <1000 grid cells are interpolated.
# License: Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0)
# References: See NetCDF attributes for detailed references of original sea-ice concentration datasets
# Notes: This CSV contains September-only SIA data derived from the full NetCDF dataset.
# Extended by Sarah Thomae for the year 2024
